Class Words

java.lang.Object
  Words

public class Words
extends java.lang.Object

Based on our dictionary (a List of Strings) a random 6 letter word will be chosen. Permutations of that word are then generated with 3, 4, 5 and 6 character words. These permutations are then cross-referenced by the dictionary and permutations that are actual words will then be put in a List of words used in the game.

Version:
May 10, 2012
Author:
Zack Berman

Constructor Detail

Words

public Words(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> XLetterWords)
Constructs a Words object. A six letter word is chosen from a list of 6 letter words and is assigned to letters. shuffledLetters is assigned to letters words6, words5, words4, words3, gameWords, encrypted and dictionary are instantiated as blank ArrayLists of Strings

Parameters:
SixLetter - Words an ArrayList of 6 character Strings

isSolved

public boolean isSolved(int index)
Boolean method that returns true if a word in the encrypted list has been solved

Parameters:
index - Index of the encrypted list
Returns:
true if the word at index has been solved.

makeWords1

public void makeWords1()
Difficulty Level 1 Creates 5,4, and 3 letter permutations of the 5 letter String letters. MergeSorter is used to sort these lists. If a permutation is a word in the dictionary, it is added to gameWords. If not, it is thrown out. encrypted is made with 3,4, and 5 character ? mark Strings to match the length of gameWords

makeWords2

public void makeWords2()
Difficulty Level 2 Creates 6,5,4, and 3 letter permutations of the 6 letter String letters. MergeSorter is used to sort these lists. If a permutation is a word in the dictionary, it is added to gameWords. If not, it is thrown out. encrypted is made with 3,4,5, and 6 character ? mark Strings to match the length of gameWords

makeWords3

public void makeWords3()
Difficulty Level 3 Creates 7, 6,5,4, and 3 letter permutations of the 7 letter String letters. MergeSorter is used to sort these lists. If a permutation is a word in the dictionary, it is added to gameWords. If not, it is thrown out. encrypted is made with 3,4,5,6 and 7 character ? mark Strings to match the length of gameWords

permutations

public void permutations(java.lang.String a,
                         java.lang.String z,
                         java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> perms)
Permutations algorithm that adds all permutations of a String (String z) to an ArrayList (perms)

Parameters:
a - Beginning String (initially "")
z - Ending String (initially the String to be permutated)
perms - ArrayList of permutations

rotate

public java.lang.String rotate(java.lang.String orig)
Returns a string that is a rotated version of the inputed string. ex) 1234 --> 2341

Parameters:
orig - Original String
Returns:
str Rotated String

shuffleLetters

public void shuffleLetters()
Shuffles the word being used in the game ex.) letters = "orange" shuffledLetters = "orange" after shuffleLetters(), shuffledLetters = "groane"

Decrypts an individual word in the encrypted ArrayList
